original: @#// 'jam dpal phyag rgya zil gnon gyi skong ba bsdus pa yang rdzong ma bzhugs so //
analyzed: jam dpal phyag rgya zil gnon gyi skong ba sdud ba yang rdzong ma bzhugs so

original: hu~m/ rgyal kun yab gcig bcom ldan 'jam dpal dbyangs //
analyzed: rgyal kun yab gcig joms ldan jam dpal dbyangs

original: drag tu khros pa dpal chen gshin rje'i gshed //
analyzed: drag tu khro ba dpal chen gshin rje gshed

original: 'jigs byed khrag 'thung phyag rgya zil gyis gnon //
analyzed: jigs byed khrag thung phyag rgya zil gyis gnon

original: dad pa dam tshhig dbang gis spyan 'dren na //
analyzed: dad ba dam tshhig dbang gis spyan bgrang na

original: 'khor bcas chos kyi dbyings nas sku bzhengs la //
analyzed: khor cha chos kyi dbyings nas sku bzhengs la

original: dur khrod 'bar ba'i gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol //
analyzed: dur khrod bar ba gnas dir gshegs su gsol

analyzed: snang ba snod kyi jal yas khang ba ru

original: srid pa bcud kyi mchod rdzas lhun gyis grub //
analyzed: srid ba bcud kyi mchod rdzas lhun gyis grub

original: phung khams skye mched lus kyi gzhong pa ru //
analyzed: phung khams skye mched lus kyi gzhong ba ru

original: rang byung dur khrod drag po'i dam rdzas bshams //
analyzed: rang byung dur khrod drag po dam rdzas bshams

original: rtog med mtshhan ldan gsang ba'i bam chen la //
analyzed: rtogs med mtshhan ldan gsang ba bam chen la

analyzed: dgyes skong dam tshhig gnyan po yongs su rdzogs

original: zab gsal chos kyi dbyings kyi snod yangs par //
analyzed: zab gsal chos kyi dbyings kyi snod yangs ba

analyzed: mi gyur ye shes rig ba bdud rtshis geng

analyzed: snang stong lha rdzas phyi mchod tshhar du dngar

analyzed: gsal stong rang byung nang mchod sprin ltar gtibs

analyzed: bde stong phyag rgya gsang mchod gar gyis sgeg

original: 'khor 'das kun khyab rmad byung dam rdzas 'dis //

analyzed: gyad gnon chen po brgyad kyi thugs dam skong

original: zhes pa'ang sgrub gnas chen po sbrags kyi yang rdzong gshin rje rol pa'i dkyil 'khor du tshhogs 'khor brgya rtsha bgyis pa'i tshhe pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug rtshal gyis yud tsham la shar mar bris pa dge legs 'phel ///
